00065 #ifndef SPI_IF_H
00066 #define SPI_IF_H
00067 
00068 #include "TI_USCI_SPI_Regs.h"
00069 
00070 //*SPI interface defines to BQ Pack*/
00071 #define NUMBER_OF_SPI_REGS        BQ_SPI_REG_MAX
00072 
00073 #define READ_ACCESS               (1<<0)
00074 #define WRITE_ACCESS              (1<<1)
00075 
00079 typedef enum SPI_REGS
00080 {
00081   SPI_DEV_ID,
00082   SPI_REV,
00083   SPI_STATUS
00084 } spi_regs_t;
00085 
00089 short spi_read_reg(unsigned char dev_addr,
00090                    unsigned char reg_addr,
00091                    short elem_num,
00092                    unsigned char discard_crc,/*True, False*/
00093                    unsigned char* pData);
00094 
00095 short spi_write_reg(unsigned char dev_addr, 
00096                     unsigned char reg_addr, 
00097                     unsigned char data);
00098 
00099 void init_spi(void);
